018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.cli;
019
020import java.io.File;
021import java.nio.file.Path;
022import java.sql.SQLException;
023import java.time.LocalDateTime;
024import java.time.ZoneId;
025import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
028
029import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.H2LogReader;
030import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.H2LogReader.NodeInfo;
031import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.LogEntry;
032import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.LogLevel;
033import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.SessionSummary;
034
035import picocli.CommandLine;
036import picocli.CommandLine.Command;
037import picocli.CommandLine.Option;
038
039/**
040 * CLI tool for querying workflow execution logs from H2 database.
041 *
042 * <p>Usage examples:</p>
043 * <pre>
044 * # Show summary of the latest session
045 * java -jar actor-IaC.jar logs --db logs --summary
046 *
047 * # Show logs for a specific node
048 * java -jar actor-IaC.jar logs --db logs --node node-001
049 *
050 * # Show only error logs
051 * java -jar actor-IaC.jar logs --db logs --level ERROR
052 *
053 * # List all sessions
054 * java -jar actor-IaC.jar logs --db logs --list
055 * </pre>
056 *
057 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
058 */
059@Command(
060    name = "logs",
061    mixinStandardHelpOptions = true,
062    version = "actor-IaC logs 2.10.0",
063    description = "Query workflow execution logs from H2 database."
064)
065public class LogsCLI implements Callable<Integer> {
066
067    /**
068     * ISO 8601 format with timezone offset (e.g., 2026-01-05T10:30:00+09:00).
069     */
070    private static final DateTimeFormatter ISO_FORMATTER =
071            DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX");
072
073    /**
074     * System timezone for display.
075     */
076    private static final ZoneId SYSTEM_ZONE = ZoneId.systemDefault();
077
078    @Option(
079        names = {"--db"},
080        description = "H2 database path (without .mv.db extension)",
081        required = true
082    )
083    private File dbPath;
084
085    @Option(
086        names = {"-s", "--session"},
087        description = "Session ID to query (default: latest session)"
088    )
089    private Long sessionId;
090
091    @Option(
092        names = {"-n", "--node"},
093        description = "Filter logs by node ID"
094    )
095    private String nodeId;
096
097    @Option(
098        names = {"--level"},
099        description = "Minimum log level to show (DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR)",
100        defaultValue = "DEBUG"
101    )
102    private LogLevel minLevel;
103
104    @Option(
105        names = {"--summary"},
106        description = "Show session summary only"
107    )
108    private boolean summaryOnly;
109
110    @Option(
111        names = {"--list"},
112        description = "List recent sessions"
113    )
114    private boolean listSessions;
115
116    @Option(
117        names = {"-w", "--workflow"},
118        description = "Filter sessions by workflow name"
119    )
120    private String workflowFilter;
121
122    @Option(
123        names = {"-o", "--overlay"},
124        description = "Filter sessions by overlay name"
125    )
126    private String overlayFilter;
127
128    @Option(
129        names = {"-i", "--inventory"},
130        description = "Filter sessions by inventory name"
131    )
132    private String inventoryFilter;
133
134    @Option(
135        names = {"--after"},
136        description = "Filter sessions started after this time (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)"
137    )
138    private String startedAfter;
139
140    @Option(
141        names = {"--since"},
142        description = "Filter sessions started within the specified duration (e.g., 12h, 1d, 3d, 1w)"
143    )
144    private String since;
145
146    @Option(
147        names = {"--ended-since"},
148        description = "Filter sessions ended within the specified duration (e.g., 1h, 12h, 1d)"
149    )
150    private String endedSince;
151
152    @Option(
153        names = {"--limit"},
154        description = "Maximum number of entries to show",
155        defaultValue = "100"
156    )
157    private int limit;
158
159    @Option(
160        names = {"--list-nodes"},
161        description = "List all nodes in the specified session"
162    )
163    private boolean listNodes;
164
165    /**
166     * Main entry point for the logs CLI.
167     *
168     * @param args command line arguments
169     */
170    public static void main(String[] args) {
171        int exitCode = new CommandLine(new LogsCLI()).execute(args);
172        System.exit(exitCode);
173    }
174
175    @Override
176    public Integer call() {
177        Path path = dbPath.toPath();
178
179        try (H2LogReader reader = new H2LogReader(path)) {
180            if (listSessions) {
181                return listRecentSessions(reader);
182            }
183
184            // Determine session ID
185            long targetSession = sessionId != null ? sessionId : reader.getLatestSessionId();
186            if (targetSession < 0) {
187                System.err.println("No sessions found in database.");
188                return 1;
189            }
190
191            if (listNodes) {
192                return listNodesInSession(reader, targetSession);
193            }
194
195            if (summaryOnly) {
196                return showSummary(reader, targetSession);
197            }
198
199            return showLogs(reader, targetSession);
200
201        } catch (SQLException e) {
202            System.err.println("Database error: " + e.getMessage());
203            return 1;
204        } catch (Exception e) {
205            System.err.println("Error: " + e.getMessage());
206            return 1;
207        }
208    }
209
210    private Integer listRecentSessions(H2LogReader reader) {
211        // Parse start time filter (--since takes precedence over --after)
212        LocalDateTime startedAfterTime = null;
213        if (since != null) {
214            startedAfterTime = parseSince(since);
215            if (startedAfterTime == null) {
216                System.err.println("Invalid --since format. Use: 12h, 1d, 3d, 1w (h=hours, d=days, w=weeks)");
217                return 1;
218            }
219        } else if (startedAfter != null) {
220            try {
221                startedAfterTime = LocalDateTime.parse(startedAfter);
222            } catch (Exception e) {
223                System.err.println("Invalid date format. Use ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss");
224                return 1;
225            }
226        }
227
228        // Parse end time filter
229        LocalDateTime endedAfterTime = null;
230        if (endedSince != null) {
231            endedAfterTime = parseSince(endedSince);
232            if (endedAfterTime == null) {
233                System.err.println("Invalid --ended-since format. Use: 1h, 12h, 1d, 3d (h=hours, d=days, w=weeks)");
234                return 1;
235            }
236        }
237
238        // Apply filters if any are specified
239        List<SessionSummary> sessions;
240        if (workflowFilter != null || overlayFilter != null || inventoryFilter != null || startedAfterTime != null || endedAfterTime != null) {
241            sessions = reader.listSessionsFiltered(workflowFilter, overlayFilter, inventoryFilter, startedAfterTime, endedAfterTime, limit);
242        } else {
243            sessions = reader.listSessions(limit);
244        }
245
246        if (sessions.isEmpty()) {
247            System.out.println("No sessions found.");
248            return 0;
249        }
250
251        System.out.println("Sessions:");
252        System.out.println("=".repeat(80));
253        for (SessionSummary summary : sessions) {
254            System.out.printf("#%-4d %-30s %-10s%n",
255                    summary.getSessionId(),
256                    summary.getWorkflowName(),
257                    summary.getStatus());
258            if (summary.getOverlayName() != null) {
259                System.out.printf("      Overlay:   %s%n", summary.getOverlayName());
260            }
261            if (summary.getInventoryName() != null) {
262                System.out.printf("      Inventory: %s%n", summary.getInventoryName());
263            }
264            System.out.printf("      Started:   %s%n", formatTimestamp(summary.getStartedAt()));
265            System.out.println("-".repeat(80));
266        }
267        return 0;
268    }
269
270    private Integer listNodesInSession(H2LogReader reader, long targetSession) {
271        List<NodeInfo> nodes = reader.getNodesInSession(targetSession);
272        if (nodes.isEmpty()) {
273            System.out.println("No nodes found in session #" + targetSession);
274            return 0;
275        }
276
277        SessionSummary summary = reader.getSummary(targetSession);
278        System.out.println("Nodes in session #" + targetSession + " (" + summary.getWorkflowName() + "):");
279        System.out.println("=".repeat(70));
280        System.out.printf("%-30s %-10s %-10s%n", "NODE_ID", "STATUS", "LOG_COUNT");
281        System.out.println("-".repeat(70));
282        for (NodeInfo node : nodes) {
283            System.out.printf("%-30s %-10s %-10d%n",
284                    node.nodeId(),
285                    node.status() != null ? node.status() : "-",
286                    node.logCount());
287        }
288        System.out.println("=".repeat(70));
289        System.out.println("Total: " + nodes.size() + " nodes");
290        return 0;
291    }
292
293    private Integer showSummary(H2LogReader reader, long targetSession) {
294        SessionSummary summary = reader.getSummary(targetSession);
295        if (summary == null) {
296            System.err.println("Session not found: " + targetSession);
297            return 1;
298        }
299        System.out.println(summary);
300        return 0;
301    }
302
303    private Integer showLogs(H2LogReader reader, long targetSession) {
304        List<LogEntry> logs;
305
306        if (nodeId != null) {
307            logs = reader.getLogsByNode(targetSession, nodeId);
308            System.out.println("Logs for node: " + nodeId);
309        } else {
310            logs = reader.getLogsByLevel(targetSession, minLevel);
311            System.out.println("Logs (level >= " + minLevel + "):");
312        }
313
314        System.out.println("=".repeat(80));
315
316        int count = 0;
317        for (LogEntry entry : logs) {
318            if (count >= limit) {
319                System.out.println("... (truncated, use --limit to show more)");
320                break;
321            }
322
323            // Format: [timestamp] LEVEL [node] message
324            String levelColor = getLevelPrefix(entry.getLevel());
325            System.out.printf("%s[%s] %-5s [%s] %s%s%n",
326                    levelColor,
327                    formatTimestamp(entry.getTimestamp()),
328                    entry.getLevel(),
329                    entry.getNodeId(),
330                    entry.getMessage(),
331                    "\u001B[0m"); // Reset color
332
333            count++;
334        }
335
336        System.out.println("=".repeat(80));
337        System.out.println("Total: " + logs.size() + " entries");
338
339        return 0;
340    }
341
342    private String getLevelPrefix(LogLevel level) {
343        return switch (level) {
344            case ERROR -> "\u001B[31m"; // Red
345            case WARN -> "\u001B[33m";  // Yellow
346            case INFO -> "\u001B[32m";  // Green
347            case DEBUG -> "\u001B[36m"; // Cyan
348        };
349    }
350
351    /**
352     * Formats a LocalDateTime as ISO 8601 string with timezone offset.
353     *
354     * <p>Example output: 2026-01-05T10:30:00+09:00</p>
355     *
356     * @param timestamp the timestamp to format
357     * @return ISO 8601 formatted string, or "N/A" if null
358     */
359    private String formatTimestamp(LocalDateTime timestamp) {
360        if (timestamp == null) {
361            return "N/A";
362        }
363        return timestamp.atZone(SYSTEM_ZONE).format(ISO_FORMATTER);
364    }
365
366    /**
367     * Parses a relative time string into a LocalDateTime.
368     *
369     * <p>Supported formats:</p>
370     * <ul>
371     *   <li>{@code 12h} - 12 hours ago</li>
372     *   <li>{@code 1d} - 1 day ago</li>
373     *   <li>{@code 3d} - 3 days ago</li>
374     *   <li>{@code 1w} - 1 week ago</li>
375     * </ul>
376     *
377     * @param sinceStr the relative time string
378     * @return LocalDateTime representing the calculated time, or null if invalid format
379     */
380    private LocalDateTime parseSince(String sinceStr) {
381        if (sinceStr == null || sinceStr.isEmpty()) {
382            return null;
383        }
384
385        try {
386            String numPart = sinceStr.substring(0, sinceStr.length() - 1);
387            char unit = Character.toLowerCase(sinceStr.charAt(sinceStr.length() - 1));
388            long amount = Long.parseLong(numPart);
389
390            LocalDateTime now = LocalDateTime.now();
391            return switch (unit) {
392                case 'h' -> now.minusHours(amount);
393                case 'd' -> now.minusDays(amount);
394                case 'w' -> now.minusWeeks(amount);
395                case 'm' -> now.minusMinutes(amount);
396                default -> null;
397            };
398        } catch (NumberFormatException | StringIndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
399            return null;
400        }
401    }
402}
